overview: Patrick is the secretary of Ducas, a rich industrialist; he is also his boss's provider of erotic entertainment. To further his imagination, and no expenses asked, he travels to Bangkok to study the local massage parlors. On the side, he takes six other commissions that he intends to fulfill well. Only, two young adventurers, Anna and Dorothée will cross his path, and make his jobs really difficult.
title: Jambes en l'air à Bangkok
